name: Saw Girl
description:
Serra wakes up to find out that half of her body has been converted into a robot. When she realizes a crazy scientist is responsible and that due to an error she's the only one that can move, she decides to go stop his mad plans.

The game was made for the Quad Jam, the theme was "Don't kill anything".

(The v1.1 adds sound, some changes in dialogue and bug fixes)

Instructions:

There are two life bars, one accounts from the damage you get, and the other for the citizens accidentally damage.

AD - Move left and right

Space- Jump

Mouse- Control direction of the saw

F- Enter or exit fullscreen

Esc- Pause game
